Description: Sample of red-brown human hair, partially curled, probably taken from the back of the head of a mummy.
Curator's comments: Bibliography: N. Strudwick, Masterpieces of Ancient Egypt, London 2006, pp. 194-5. D. Antoine and M. Vandenbeusch, Egyptian mummies. Exploring ancient lives, Sydney 2016, pp. 139.
Acquisition name: Donated by: Rev Greville John Chester
